Package View.Elements

Class ViewRotatableCard

java.lang.Object
View.Elements.ViewCard
View.Elements.ViewRotatableCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
ViewAnimableCard
public class ViewRotatableCard extends ViewCard
Customize the ViewCard to provide the rotation needed by the ViewCard when displayed on screen. Primarily used to know how to rotate the image based on which hand on screen it has to be drawn.
Author:
D'annibale Luigi, Venturini Daniele

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ViewRotatableCard()
    Creates a new ViewRotatableCard with the default BACK_CARD image.
    ViewRotatableCard(Card c)
    Creates a new ViewRotatableCard of the given Card and no rotation
    ViewRotatableCard(Card c, int rotation)
    Creates a new ViewRotatableCard of the given Card and the given rotation If the rotation is not 0, then the painted image is chosen between the rotated back_card images based on the rotation.
